pullRequest.title: DISTX-415 Reduce the amount of time it takes to add new nodes
pullRequest.bodyText:
In this commit, we optimize the salt execution times by removing the high state apply after each phase of recipe execution.
There is only one high state apply in all the nodes after a scale-up.
We could still optimize the individual scripts like metering which always removes and adds the same package in all the nodes of the cluster for every scale-up.
This is the first time modifying something in salt, so I will focus on further optimization after getting initial feedback.
Also removed the deprecated pre/post-execution phases. Made sure that there are no existing salt scripts for such phases.

./gradlew build && test scale-up in a private stack to see the time getting reduced from 5 mins to 4 mins.
